mapper.sql: a.id as id, a.contractId as contractId, b.name as "userId.name", b.id as "userId.id", a.invoice as invoice, a.amount as amount, a.next_rec_time as nextRecTime, a.rec_time as recTime
left join sys_user b on b.id = a.user_id
mapper.insert: Insert INTO purifier_receivables( contractId, rec_time, next_rec_time, user_id, create_by, create_date, del_flag ) VALUES ( #{contractId}, #{recTime}, #{nextRecTime}, #{userId.id}, #{createBy.id}, #{createDate}, '0' )
mapper.update: UPDATE purifier_receivables a SET a.update_by = #{updateBy.id}, a.rec_time=#{recTime}, a.next_rec_time=#{nextRecTime}, a.user_id=#{userId.id}, a.invoice=#{invoice}, a.amount=#{amount}, a.update_date = #{updateDate} where a.id=#{id}
